Description: CloudWatch Dashboards to visualize Classic Load Balancer (CLB) resources. Both dashboards leverage Dashboard Variables to filter on the desired resources. Dashboard 'CLB_All_Resources' visualizes ALL CLB resources in the target region. Dashboard 'CLB_Individual_Resources' provides additional filters to isolate a specific CLB.

DefaultRegion.Description: Select the default region hosting the load balancers to be monitored.

DefaultCLB.Description: Select the default load balancer to be monitored. (e.g. 0123456789abcdef0123456789abcdef)

variables.label: Region
variables.customValues:
us-east-1, N. Virginia
us-east-2, Ohio
us-west-1, N.California
ca-central-1, Canada
us-west-2, Oregon
eu-west-1, Ireland
eu-west-2, London
eu-central-1, Frankfurt
